title: Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail: Cooperating Association
body: Cooperating Association         Merchandise for the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail can be purchased throughout the network NPS Photo / Guell  Pins, patches, books and maps related to the Trail network are available at many bookstores within various National Park Service visitor centers in the Trail corridor, as well as from the Eastern National website or by calling 1-877-NAT-PARK. Some items are also available at the Harper's Ferry Historical Association bookstore or by calling 304-535-6881, and from the Potomac Appalachian Trail Club.
